Roberto J. Bayardo Jr., and Daniel P. Miranker, "A Complexity Analysis of Space-Bounded Learning Algorithms for the Constraint Satisfaction Problem", Appeared in Proc. of the 13th Nat値 Conf. on Artificial Intelligence, 298-304, 1996.

Roberto J. Bayardo Jr. and Daniel P. Miranker, "On the Space-Time Trade-off in Solving Constraint Satisfaction Problems", Appeared in Proc. of the 14th Int値 Joint Conf. on Artificial Intelligence, 558-562, 1995.
